Author: binary_ico
Title: [ANN] Binary.com ICO: Binary options pioneer offers tokens with DIVIDENDS
Body: Binary.com ICO will be done through Dutch Auction concept. The final token price will be determined by the end of the auction. During the offering period, investors may start bid at USD 1.35 per token with a minimum of 25 tokens, and a higher bid price may secure a slot in the auction. This Dutch Auction concept is quiet common in public securities offering (like IPO)

Title: [ANN] Binary.com ICO: Binary options pioneer offers tokens with DIVIDENDS
Body: Is this decentralized using smart contracts and escrow wallets like Spectre? Because if its not than its just another crappy Binary Options platform where the brokers screw everyone over and hold your withdrawals.

Author: binary_ico
Title: [ANN] Binary.com ICO: Binary options pioneer offers tokens with DIVIDENDS
Body: We intend to raise up to 10 millions tokens.  For AMA sessions, we had several YouTube live streaming session where you can ask anything via our live chat. We plan to run several more sessions ahead, please subscribe to our YouTube channel here: https://www.youtube.com/user/BinaryTradingVideos for the update. In the mean time, you can also ask us any questions related to our ICO to: marketing@binary.com. Thanks!

Author: binary_ico
Title: [ANN] Binary.com ICO: Binary options pioneer offers tokens with DIVIDENDS
Body: Binary.com has been in the business since 2000 and we have the trust from the community.  Decentralised systems might be something we will work on in future, however please notes that our entire quote database is already publicly available through an API, and we rely on good quality feeds from multiple providers.

It is now 2 days later but i'm still waiting for the three confirmations to receive refund ?

Author: binary_ico
Title: [ANN] Binary.com ICO: Binary options pioneer offers tokens with DIVIDENDS
Body: ★ Binary.com has just announced an exciting initiative to deliver one of the first ever securities ICOs – it’s like an IPO on the blockchain ★  ★ The ICO goes from 15 November to 25 December 2017 ★ [be quick – one week left!]  ★ FIND OUT MORE AT ICO.BINARY.COM ★  ★ Social media links ★ Telegram : t.me/binarydotcom Reddit : reddit.com/r/binary_ico/ FB : facebook.com/binarydotcom  Why choose Binary.com?  Founded in 1999, Binary.com is the pioneer of online binary options trading. We grew from one simple idea: to make binary options easily accessible to retail investors worldwide. Today, we’ve established ourselves as a market leader and one of the world’s most popular online binary options trading platforms.  [Find out more on why people choose Binary.com] https://marketing.binary.com/images/ico/pic1.png  What makes us stand out?  Binary.com is the leading company in the binary options industry.  Since launching, we’ve cleared more than US$3 billion in trades, and picked up a string of major international awards.  Binary.com's patented pricing technology allows traders to benefit from the same rates of return as traders in the interbank market. We provide: Real-time prices, benchmarked against interbank options markets. Returns often above 100% on simple rise/fall forex contracts. Returns often above 1,000% on higher/lower and touch/no-touch trades. No hidden fees or commissions.  Using our platform is simple: Choose a payout and our system calculates the stake required to purchase the contract. Traders know the risk and reward before purchasing a contract. Traders risk only their initial stake, and the stake never increases. Traders can sell their contract before expiry to keep any profit or minimise a loss.  [Find out more on what makes us stand out] https://marketing.binary.com/images/ico/pic2.png  Details of our ICO  Start date 15 November 2017  Finish date 25 December 2017  Token distribution TBA  Token sales under the ICO Issued shares: 210,257,430 ordinary shares Maximum number of tokens to be issued under the offer: 10,000,000  Where will tokens be listed? The tokens will be listed on the Lykke Exchange, where they can be traded after the ICO. This means token holders can capitalise on any rise in value -- just like shares on a stock exchange.  Accepts Cryptocurrencies: ETH, BTC, BCH, LTC Fiat currencies: USD, GBP, EUR, AUD  Dividends Each token holder has the right to receive payments equivalent to shareholder dividends.  How the ICO will work  [Visual on how the ICO process would work] https://marketing.binary.com/images/ico/pic3.png  Still confused? Check out the ICO process in detail here: ico_documents.binary.com/howto_ico.pdf  Token dividends Binary.com has paid out dividends to shareholders for 11 consecutive years. We expect to continue paying out dividends, provided the financial health of the business remains robust.  [Find out more about the features of our Token Dividends] https://marketing.binary.com/images/ico/pic4.png  Financial overview Binary.com is in excellent financial shape. The business carries no debt, and has recorded 15 consecutive years of net profit. You can read more about our financial performance in our 2016 Annual Report, here: https://ico_documents.binary.com/binary_ltd_2016_annual_report.pdf  [A highlight of our latest financial figures] https://marketing.binary.com/images/ico/pic5.png  Board of directors The board of directors of Binary.com has over 30 years’ combined experience in the binary options industry. The CEO, Jean-Yves Sireau (‘JY’), is considered the father of the industry, as he was the first to introduce a binary options trading platform to retail investors.  [Pictures of our Board of Directors] https://marketing.binary.com/images/ico/pic6.png  You can access the social media profiles of our board here ico.binary.com  Media reviews of our ICO A number of credible parties have reviewed our upcoming ICO. Here are the direct links:  https://www.financemagnates.com/binary-options/brokers/exclusive-binary-com-ico-shows-company-profits-surpass-20-mln-2017/ http://www.profitf.com/news/binary-com-offers-securities-backed-tokens-initial-coin-offering-ico/ http://www.profitf.com/interviews/interview-jean-yves-sireau-ceo-binary-com/ https://www.financemagnates.com/cryptocurrency/exchange/binary-com-blockchain-ipo-tokens-list-lykke-vanuatu-exchange/ https://www.leaprate.com/experts/jean-yves-sireau/funding-benefits-ico-initial-coin-offering/

Author: Virgo xXx
Title: [ANN] Binary.com ICO: Binary options pioneer offers tokens with DIVIDENDS

Author: binary_ico
Title: [ANN] Binary.com ICO: Binary options pioneer offers tokens with DIVIDENDS
Body: Binary.com ICO will be done differently than most ICOs out there. We are using an "IPO on the blockchain" concept. This means our tokens will be subjected to regulations and best practices designed to protect investors. It is also linked with dividends payment! (just like an IPO, but in the blockchain).  The token price will be determined through Dutch Auction where you may bid from $1.35/tokens (or equivalent value to other currencies/cryptocurrencies) with a minimum bid of 25 tokens.

Title: [ANN] Binary.com ICO: Binary options pioneer offers tokens with DIVIDENDS
Body: Yes. The ERC20 tokens will be tradable once it's listed to our appointed listing exchange. In this case it's gonna be Lykke Exchange. The listing date is not confirmed yet. But it will be some time after the ICO ends

Author: binary_ico
Title: [ANN] Binary.com ICO: Binary options pioneer offers tokens with DIVIDENDS
Body: We called it "IPO on the Blockhain" it is more like stocks offering but in crypto world.... We thought it's time to issue meaningful tokens which subjected to regulations and best practices designed to protect investors. It may be a new thing, but we hope it can be a landmark event in the ICO space
